title: Experience a lifestyle of comfort and convenience at Dayton Meadows Apartments!
posting_body: ['2 Bedroom  1 Bathroom | 857 sq ft | $1493/Month', 'Dayton Meadows Apartments', '1749 S Dayton St', 'Denver, CO 80247', 'show contact info', 'Description:', 'Part of the Your Tour, Your Way program.', "It's your apartment and you are welcome to tour in a way that makes you feel most at home.", 'Whether you prefer to take a self-guided tour on your own, be accompanied by one of our leasing professionals, or take a live video tour from the comfort of your home, we have options that will work for you!', 'Apartment Amenities:', '● Air Conditioning/Heating', '● Cable Ready', '● Ceiling Fans', '● Dishwasher', '● High Speed Internet Access', '● Range', '● Refrigerator', '● Smoke Free', '● Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', '● LED Lighting', '● Patio/Balcony', '● Vaulted Ceiling', '● Views', '● Walk-In Closets', '● Washer/Dryer Hookup', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '● 24 hr Emergency Maintenance', '● Accepts Credit Cards', '● Affordable Housing', '● Clubhouse', '● Fitness Center', '● On-Site Maintenance', '● Playground', '● Section 8 Vouchers Accepted', '● Smoke Free', '● Mature Landscaping with Lush Foliage', '● Online Payments', '● Open Field Recreation Area', '● Property Manager on Site', '● Self-Guided Tours', 'Additional Details:', 'Deposit: Call', 'Terms: 12-Month', 'Pets: Dayton Meadows Apartments is a pet friendly community.', 'We allow two (2) pets max per household with a 25 pound per pet weight limit.', '$35/pet rent per month.', '$200.00 non-refundable pet deposit.', 'For complete Breed Restrictions, please see the Important Links section on our website.', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '82AD86350EC746']
